Text:
Please! Ask before uploading to another tracker! Thank You for your integrity here at Pedro's

I hate those people who just ignore the btmusic rules...

I am looking for  Al Stewards "Year of the Cat" MFSL / Flac
and for Alan Parsons "Tales of Mystery and Imagination" MFSL / Flac
Can someone upload them pleeze ?!
This an excellent recording, but there is no sound for the last 2 minutes of "Money". Don't remember this on the LP 30 years ago. Anyone else have the same problem?

According to Wikipedia, "[t]he only time there is a gap of silence on the whole album is between "The Great Gig in the Sky" and "Money", where there is a side change on the LP".

So there you go. I suppose if it bothers you you could edit it out. I believe this release also require preemphasis, but I could be mistaken in that.
Can one of you experts tell me why this version is so special and is it better than the recently remastered SACD 'purple' edition?

There is clear difference between Shine On Boxset and SACD version, but I cant' say which is better.
SACD has a little more midbass, but is still sounds fine. Downloading this for comparison

Audiochecker tells me it looks MPEG with 92%  probability for some tracks while "Could not qualify the source of this track" for others.

Some help mates?
